result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 1:30 pm 
INCLUDES 16CM1511, 15CM1313, 15CM1643, 15CM1781, AND 15TR3396. 
State appears by ADA Sid Brubacher; Def appears in person with Atty Kat Jackan.  
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed. 

State moves to: 
In 16CM1511: Ct. 1 (Misd. BJ/Repeater)>>D&RI. 
                       : Ct. 2 (Misd. BJ/Repeater)>>D&RI. 
In 15CM1313: Ct. 1 (OWI 2nd/Repeater)>>DELETE Repeater enhancer. 
                       : Ct. 2 (Operating with PAC 2nd/Repeater)>>D&RI. 
In 15CM1643: Ct. 2 (OAR/Repeater)>>D&RI. 
                       : Ct. 3 (Misd. BJ/Repeater)>>D&RI. 
                       : Ct. 4 (Possess Drug Paraphernalia/Repeater)>>D&RI. 
In 15CM1781: Ct. 1 (OAR/Repeater)>>D&RI. 
                        : Ct. 2 (Misd. BJ/Repeater)>>D&RI. 
COURT grants above. 

COURT finds refusal in 15TR3396 to be REASONABLE. 

PLEA: 
In 15CM1313: Amended Ct. 1 (OWI 2nd)>>NO CONTEST. 

Upon that plea, State moves to: 
In 15CM1643: Ct. 1 (OWI 2nd/Repeater)>>AMEND to OWI 3rd/Repeater. 
COURT grants above. 

PLEA: 
In 15CM1643: Amended Ct. 1 (OWI 3rd/Repeater)>>NO CONTEST. 

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis, & def guilty. 
Def makes statement. 

COURT ORDERS: 
In 15CM1313: Ct. 1>>$1520 inclusive w/ 60 days to pay or payment plan; DNA sample; 30 days MCJ with 30 days credit; 13 months dl revocation with admin credit; 13 months IID requirement commencing today; AODA; 6 pts against dl. 
In 15CM1643: Ct. 1>>SWH for 2 years probation - CONDITIONS: $1694 inclusive; DNA sample; cooperate fully with SSTOP; 90 days MCJ - 70 days STAYED and 20 days to be served with huber for work/treatment/ if eligible and 45 days to start; maintain absolute sobriety from drugs/alcohol except for prescriptions taken as prescribed; 26 months dl revocation with admin credit to run CONCURRENT to dl revocation in 15CM1313; 26 months IID requirement; assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by the agent; AODA; 6 pts against dl. 
COURT finds def entitled to NO days jail credit in 15CM1643. 

Adj: 1:52 pm
Plea/sentencing hearing on August 25, 2016 at 01:15 pm.

for Adjournment of 8/23/16 Plea Hearing - Granted
**Includes 15CM1313, 15CM1643 & 15CM1781

and Demand for Discovery & Inspection
-State's
Defendant's
K Jackan
